messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Thank you so much for all of the info on Alge...
messages.msgSnippet: ... Pull it back out, Holly. For yourself. And have fun!  -pam National Home Education Network  Serving the entire homeschooling community
messages.messageBody:
On Apr 30, 2004, at 1:13 PM, Holly Furgason wrote:

> We got a free copy of that and I never even looked at it to see what
> it was. The kids played it forever.

Pull it back out, Holly. For yourself. And have fun! <G>

-pam
National Home Education Network
<www.NHEN.org>
Serving the entire homeschooling community since 1999
through information, networking and public relations.

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Thank you so much for all of the info on Alge...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/30/2004 7:26:26 PM Eastern Daylight Time, tri_mom@comcast.net writes: Oh yeah, my kids LOVE the zoombinis. We get them from the library
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/30/2004 7:26:26 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
tri_mom@... writes:
Oh yeah, my kids LOVE the zoombinis. We get them from the library
whenever we can get ahold of them.<<<<<

I just bought one for a friend at TJ Maxx for $3.00! They had sets of two for
$7.00. Look around!

~Kelly

messages.subject: Re: Thank you so much for all of the info on Alge...
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh yeah, my kids LOVE the zoombinis. We get them from the library whenever we can get ahold of them. Blue Skies, -Robin-
messages.messageBody:

> In a message dated 4/30/2004 1:15:45 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> unschooler@s... writes:
> Mathematical thinking doesn't even require numbers.<<<<
>
> And taDAH! Zoombinis!

Oh yeah, my kids LOVE the zoombinis. We get them from the library
whenever we can get ahold of them.

Blue Skies,
-Robin-
